document_data.name: Caravan Court
document_data.mainbody: '''Caravan Court''' was a large courtyard that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Caravan Court was located in the northeast section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The northern side of the courtyard bordered the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]]. Streets connecting with Caravan Court included [[Quarrel's Flight]], [[Sahtyra's Lane]], [[Ruid's Stroll]], [[the Rising Ride]], [[Belzer's Walk]], and [[Caravan Street]].
document_data.Activities: The court was a popular spot for old men to gather and watch others perform hard labor and sweat. Many brought their own stools or crates for the occasion.
